item.title: Elon Musk considers making verification a Twitter Blue perk
item.description: Elon Musk considers making verification a Twitter Blue perk With Elon Musk in charge, Twitter is planning to boost the price of its Blue subscription plan from $5 to $20 per month and make it mandatory for verified users, according to Platformer's Casey Newton and The Verge.
